routing.partMismatch: All selected parts must be from the same owner to create a quality notification (Supplier/Own).
routing.hasCustomerPart: It is not possible to create a quality notification for customer parts. All selected parts must be from the same owner (Supplier/Own).
routing.unauthorized: Functionality is disabled because of missing role. Ask your administrator to provide the required role for the functionality.
routing.notificationInProcess: Actions are unavailable on notifications in processing state
routing.notAllowedForAsPlanned: This function is not available for Parts in the Lifecycle "AsPlanned".
routing.noChildPartsForInvestigation: This function is not available for Parts without components.
routing.noCustomerAsPlannedParts: Customer parts in lifecycle "AsPlanned" are not available.
routing.illegalAssetStateToPublish: One or more selected parts are not in the required import state "TRANSIENT" or "ERROR".
routing.notAllowedForNonPersistentPart: Quality notifications can only be created for parts that are in the import state "PERSISTENT".
routing.onlyAllowedForOwnParts: This functionality is only possible for own parts.
routing.notAuthorizedOwner: This functionality is only allowed for own and supplier parts.

actions.notificationInProgress: Notification is currently in processing state

table.multiSortingTooltip: First click: sort in ascending order ↑ Second click: sort in descending order ↓ Third click: reset sorting

tableSettings.invalid: Due to an error table settings have been reset
tableSettings.title: Table column settings
tableSettings.orderTooltip: Table column order can be changed by selecting a column and move it up or down by clicking on the icon ↑ (up) or ↓ (down)
tableSettings.refreshTooltip: Reset individual table column settings to default

table.multiActionsNotImplemented: Functionality for action on multiple notifications is not implemented yet.
table.selectAtLeastOne: Requires at least one selection in the policies table
table.selectOnlyOne: Action requires only one selection from the table
table.unauthorized: Functionality is disabled because of missing role. Ask your administrator to provide the required role for the functionality.
table.missingBusinessPartner: The selection does not contain a Business partner number. Please check your selected parts.
table.onlyNotificationInStatusCreatedAllowed: Action only allowed with a selection of notifications in status "Queued".

errorMessage.notificationError: The service has reported an error when processing this notification.
errorMessage.min: Please enter a number that is larger than: {{min}}.
errorMessage.max: Please enter a number that is smaller than: {{max}}.
errorMessage.minLength: Please enter a text that is larger than: {{minLength}}. Current: {{current}}
errorMessage.maxLength: Please enter a text that is smaller than: {{maxLength}}. Current: {{current}}
errorMessage.pattern: Please enter data that matches this pattern: {{- pattern}}.
errorMessage.bpn: Please enter a valid BPN (example: BPNL00000001ABC2).
errorMessage.maxDate: Please select a date that is before {{- maxDate}}.
errorMessage.minDate: Please select a date that is after {{- minDate}}.
errorMessage.currentDate: Please select a date that is after {{- currentDate}}.
errorMessage.pastDate: Please select a date in the future.
errorMessage.minimumOneConstraint: Please add at least one valid constraint to the policy

unitTest.test01: This is for unit tests purposes.
unitTest.test02: This is for unit tests purposes. {{test}}
